page.title: 03Schools, Brickhill, Bedford
page.content: The comprehensive schools which serve the Brickhill area are:- { Brickhill Lower, Dove Road (5-9yr) { (adjoining Brickhill Middle) { Scott Lower, Hawk Drive (5-9yr) { Park Wood Middle, Hawk Drive (9-13yr) { St.Thomas More R.C.Upper School, { Tyne Crescent (13-18yr) (Please note that Pilgrim Upper in Brickhill Drive is the county school which serves the area) Nearby is the independent Harpur Trust school for boys, Bedford Modern (Manton Lane). Three other fee-paying Harpur Trust schools are elsewhere in Bedford and a number of children in the area attend these schools. The school buildings are used in the evenings by many local groups,such as Cubs,Guides,Brownies,Yoga,Gymnasts and Young Wives, and for community and further education meetings.
